maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: There is no turning back now. Let's move forward, Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: On ne peut plus revenir en arrière maintenant. En avant, Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: So, did I get that right?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Sinon, est-ce que j'ai bien compris ça ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: My...\. "clone" is still over there in Evotarground?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Mon...\. "clone" est toujours là-bas sur le Terrain des Évotars ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Oh Junge, this is such a weird situation.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Oh, Junge, c'est vraiment une situation étrange.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: We both just barely know each other, right?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: On ne se connait à peine, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Yet that "other Lukas" seems to be quite dear to you, because of what you both experienced together.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Et pourtant cet "autre Lukas" a l'air d'être assez cher pour toi, à cause de ce que vous avez vécu ensemble.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: It really shows how much your life is shaped by happenstance.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Ça montre vraiment à quel point notre vie est forgée par ces petites coïncidences.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Also...\. I really wonder what would happen if I met my clone over there.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Sinon...\. Je me demande vraiment ce qui arriverait si jamais je rencontrais mon clone là-bas.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Oh...\. I suppose I better be careful about that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Oh...\. J'imagine qu'il faut que je sois prudent avec ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Hi Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Salut, Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Hi?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Salut ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Man, it's still so hard to believe that you are an AI.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Eh ben, c'est toujours aussi difficile à croire que tu es une IA.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Wait...\. does that mean you understand binary?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Attends...\. Est-ce que ça veut dire que tu comprends le binaire ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: I have no idea what it means!\. You tell me!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: J'ai aucune idée de ce que ça veut dire !\. Dis-le-moi !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Nyahahahahahaha!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Nyahahahahahaha !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Really though, this is all very exciting!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Mais sérieusement, tout ce truc c'est vraiment excitant !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: You have my vote for best newbie of the year!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Tu as mon vote pour le meilleur Newbie de l'Année !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-01.json/enti.text: Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Lea, dear...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Lea, chérie...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: This whole situation is so hard to grasp for me.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Cette situation est assez difficile à comprendre pour moi.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: You know... We enjoy games like CrossWorlds, because they allow us to live a fantasy.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Tu sais... On aime jouer à des jeux comme CrossWorlds, parce qu'ils nous permettent de vivre une fantaisie.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: So that for a moment we can forget about all the worries of real life.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Pour pouvoir oublier pendant quelques instants tous les malheurs de la vraie vie.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Yet all of this... suddenly became very real, didn't it?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Mais maintenant, tout cela... est devenu bien réel, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: You could say that our fantasy... is in fact your reality, eh?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Tu pourrais dire que notre fantaisie... est en fait ta réalité, hein ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Now then... that's all the more reason to fight for your cause!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Alors... c'est encore une raison de plus pour se battre pour ta cause !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Thanks!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Merci !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: You're welcome, dear!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Avec plaisir, chérie !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Good day, Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Bonjour, Lea.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: You really are by far the most human-like AI I've experienced.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Tu es vraiment et de loin l'IA la plus humaine que j'ai vue.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: You passed the Turing Test with flying colors.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Tu as réussi le Test de Turing avec brio.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Let us hope that Ivan thinks the same way.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Espérons qu'Ivan en pense la même chose.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: I really do hope that we'll be able to create a place for Evotars like you here in CrossWorlds.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: J'espère vraiment que l'on pourra créer un endroit pour les Évotars comme toi ici dans CrossWorlds.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Thanks!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Merci !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: I really do hope that we'll be able to create a place for Evotars like you here in CrossWorlds.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: J'espère vraiment que l'on pourra créer un endroit pour les Évotars comme toi ici dans CrossWorlds.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Though it will be difficult to get Instatainment's support.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-02.json/enti.text: Bien que ça risque d'être difficile d'avoir le support de la part d'Instatainment.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea, chérie...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lea, chérie...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Now that I think about it...\. I really acted like the worst, non?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Maintenant que j'y pense...\. Je me suis vraiment mal comportée avec toi, non ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I just kept poking you about your real life...\. like...\. all the time!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je t'embêtais à propos de ta vie réelle...\. genre...\. tout le temps !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Not to mention how I reacted after the raid...\. urgh.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Sans parler de comment j'ai réagi après le raid...\. ouf.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I'm so,\. so sorry.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je suis si,\. si désolée.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I...\. I just didn't know any better but still...\. I'm sorry.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: J...\. Je ne savais pas quoi faire de mieux, mais quand même...\. je suis désolée.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I just want you to know, that you really are a dear friend to me.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je voulais juste que tu sâches, que tu es vraiment une amie pour moi.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It doesn't matter if you are an AI or anything else!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ça m'est égal que tu sois une IA ou quelque chose d'autre !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Thanks.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Merci.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It really is a bummer, that Tronny isn't around for all of this.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: C'est vraiment dommage, que Tronny ne soit pas là pour voir ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: He really is such a dork. A nice dork, though.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: C'est vraiment un intello. Un gentil intello, par contre.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Let's hope he will show up again eventually.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Espérons qu'il finira par se montrer.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Spheromancer Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Spheromanceuse Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lea.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: What is it? I'm calling you by your name now, am I not?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ? Je t'appelle par ton nom maintenant, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lea.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Wait...\. Do you want me to drop the "Spheromancer" as well?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Attends...\. Veux-tu que j'enlève aussi le "Spheromanceuse" ?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I'm afraid I'd never do that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je crains que je ne le ferais jamais.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It is a noble title every player of our class should wear with pride!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: C'est un noble titre que tout joueur de notre classe devrait arborer avec fierté !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: ...Thanks.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: ... Merci.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright, fine! But only this one time.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: OK, OK ! Mais seulement pour cette fois.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea...\. so now that the truth is out, it seems I was right!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lea...\. Maintenant que la vérité a éclaté, on dirait que j'avais raison !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: From the very beginning you have been cheating!!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Depuis le tout début tu trichais !!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Okay... with your \c[1]insane attack damage\c[0] it was rather obvious.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: OK... avec tes \c[1]dégâts de folie\c[0] c'était assez évident.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: However! Given the circumstances at the time, I suppose it's fair to let it slide.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Mais ! Vu les circonstances à l'époque, je pense que c'est raisonnable d'oublier ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Besides...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: De plus...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Sphe...\. Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Sphe...\. Lea.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I beseech you to find the means to disable that \c[1]disgraceful damage glitch\c[0]!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je te prie de trouver rapidement le moyen de désactiver cette \c[1]bidouille de dégâts disgracieux\c[0] !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Only then can you master this game as a true, honorable Spheromancer!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Seulement après cela tu pourras maitriser ce jeu comme un véritable, honorable Spheromanceur !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: When that time has come, I'll gladly challenge you to another duel!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et quand ce temps sera venu, c'est avec joie que je te mettrais au défi de me battre en duel !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I am actually very proud of you!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: ... Je suis assez fier de toi !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: You've grown into a prime example of a Spheromancer!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Tu es devenue un véritable modèle pour un Spheromanceur !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Looking back, I have to say it has been an honor to have had you as such a capable opponent.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: En regardant bien, je dois dire que c'était un honneur d'avoir eu un adversaire aussi compétent que toi.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: And indeed, you've shown me that there is still potential for me to grow as well.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et oui, tu m'as aussi montré qu'il y a encore du potentiel pour moi de m'améliorer.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: And while you didn't quite reach my level of expertise, you definitely came close!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et bien que tu n'aies pas vraiment encore atteint mon niveau d'expertise, tu en es vraiment proche !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Thanks!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Merci !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Now it's time for our greatest act of justice so far! I hope you are ready!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Maintenant il est temps d'accomplir notre plus grand acte de justice jusqu'à présent ! J'espère que tu es prête !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lea !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Poor girl...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Pauvre fille...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: You must have had a hard time, not being able to talk, not knowing about yourself.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ça ne devait vraiment pas être facile pour toi, de ne pas pouvoir parler, de ne pas savoir qui tu es...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It probably didn't help that Polly kept bothering you on top of that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et pour ça, Polly ne t'a probablement pas aidé en t'embêtant comme ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: But really, Lea, you're a strong girl.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Mais je pense vraiment que tu as du cran, Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.note: fille avec du cran is weirdly too pompous

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: From what Sergey told us you really must have gone through a lot.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: De ce que Sergey nous a dit, tu as vraiment dû traverser pas mal de choses.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Yet here you are, still happily saying "Hi" to everyone.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et pourtant tu es là, toujours heureuse à dire "Salut" à tout le monde.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Just like that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Oui, comme ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It's always a joy to play together with you!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: C'est toujours une joie de jouer avec toi !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Plus, it was very entertaining to watch you beat up Polly like that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: En plus, c'est très amusant de te regarder boxer Polly comme ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: But don't tell him I said that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Mais ne lui dis pas que je t'ai dit ça.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright, listen everyone.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: OK, Écoutez tout le monde.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Behind this door lies \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Derrière cette porte se trouve \c[3]\v[area.arid.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Let us quickly discuss how we will proceed from here.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Discutons rapidement de comment on va procéder.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Our goal is to assemble as many \c[3]Evotars\c[0] as we can find, get them close to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] to the east and then subject them to a certain \c[3]field effect\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Notre but est de rassembler autant d'\c[3]Évotars\c[0] que possible, de les amener près du \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] à l'est et de les soumettre à un certain \c[3]effet de zone\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: We need to do this as fast as possible. That's why I suggest we split in \c[3]3 teams\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Il faut que l'on fasse ça le plus vite possible. C'est pourquoi je suggère que l'on se sépare en \c[3]3 équipes\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: \c[3]Team A\c[0] will run straight to the Quest Hub and deal with all Evotars of that area.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: l'\c[3]Équipe A\c[0] va foncer vers le Carrefour de Quêtes et s'occuper de tous les Évotars de la zone.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I suggest that Lea is part of that team.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je suggère que Lea soit dans cette équipe.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Then I'll join Team A as well!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Alors je suis aussi dans l'Équipe A !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lukas, you too!\. No more level excuses!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Lukas, tu viens aussi !\. Plus d'excuses de différence de niveau !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: OK !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Good...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Bien...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Then we need two more teams tasked with \c[3]gathering all Evotars of the area\c[0] and leading them to the Quest Hub.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Et il nous faut deux autres équipes chargées d'aller \c[3]rassembler tous les Évotars de la zone\c[0] et de les amener vers le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: \c[3]Team B\c[0] will take care of the \c[3]forest\c[0] in the north and \c[3]Team C\c[0] the \c[3]river delta\c[0] in the south.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: l'\c[3]Équipe B\c[0] s'occupera de la \c[3]Forêt\c[0] au nord et l'\c[3]Équipe C\c[0] s'occupera du \c[3]delta de la rivière\c[0] au sud.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Joern and I will take care of the forest!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Joern et moi allons nous occuper de la forêt !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alrighty! That leaves Buggy, Al, and me for Team C!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Bon ! Ça laisse Buggy, Al et moi pour l'Équipe C !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Perfect, we're all set!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Parfait, donc on est bon !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Everyone, get ready!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Préparez-vous ! À mon signal !

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Operation start!!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Commencez l'opération !!
